# Day 1213

Another day signifying I've been on this planet for another year. Crazy how fast times goes by as you get older. Had a nice steak dinner tonight at Stonewoods. Grateful I got to celebrate with my family and loves ones. God is good.

Tomorrow I'm going to show my team at work how to build an app from scratch using Replit. I need to brainstorm what I will build so tonight that's what this post is going to be about. Decided to enlist AI's help and this is the Prompt I will use in Replit tomorrow:

> **ðŸš€  Project: Bitcoin Blaster - Ultraâ€‘Addictive Laser Runner**

> **Goal:** In **one go**, produce a singleâ€‘file HTML5 Canvas + vanilla JS game that hooks players instantly, "one more run" after every action.

> 1. Project Setup

> **Single HTML**

> Embed all CSS and JS into `index.html`.

> **Canvas Initialization**

> `<canvas id="game" width="480" height="640"></canvas>`

> Autoâ€‘scale to window while preserving aspect ratio.

> **Asset Placeholders**

> Simple geometry + text (no external assets).

> Define colors/gradients up top:

> `const COLORS = { bg: '#000011', neonBlue: '#0ff', neonOrange: '#f80', gold: '#fc0', red: '#f00', purple: '#909' };`

> 2. Loading Screen

> **Structure:** Fullâ€‘screen dark overlay + centered spinning â‚¿ + "CLICK TO MINE" button

> **Animation:**

> Rotate `â‚¿` continuously.

> Pulse button glow.

> **Interaction:**

> On click: fadeâ€‘out overlay, start game loop.

> 3. Core Loop & Player

> **Game States:**

> `LOADING â†’ PLAYING â†’ GAMEOVER`

> **Player Object:**

> `const player = { lane: 1, // 0,1,2 xPositions: [80,240,400], y: 550, width: 60, height: 60, energy: 100, lives: 3, speed: 0, drift: 0.2 };`

> **Controls:**

> **A/D** or **â†/â†’** â†’ `player.lane = clamp(lane Â±1)`

> Smooth interpolation: `player.x += (targetX - player.x) * drift`.

> **SPACE** â†’ `fireLaser()`; hold â†’ autoâ€‘fire at `fireRate` until `energy == 0`.

> 4. Entities & Mechanics

> **Collectibles**

> **Sat** orb: +10 score, +15 energy (cap at 100)

> **Whale** coin (1% chance): +50 score, fullâ€‘screen flash

> **Obstacles**

> **FUD** block: destroyable, +5 points

> **Spike**: instant death on collision

> **Laser**

> Energy cost: `1` per shot; recharge `+0.1` per frame or via sats

> Render as bright line with muzzle flash

> **Combo & Speed**

> Track `comboCount`, reset after 1s of no hit

> Multiplier: `1 + floor(comboCount / 3)` up to Ã—5

> Increase scroll speed every 200 points

> 5. Rendering & VFX

> **Background:** Scrolling grid of faint â‚¿ symbols in parallax

> **Player:**

> Rotate/tilt sprite based on lane changes

> Laser muzzle: brief circle + flash outline

> **Particles:**

> On coin/obstacle destroy: spawn 10â€“20 particles, fade & shrink

> **Screen Shake:** 1â€“5px on death or near miss

> **UI:**

> Score: large topâ€‘left, "+n" popâ€‘ups at impact

> Energy bar: neon outline + fill

> Lives: gold hearts at topâ€‘right

> 6. Audio Hooks

> Search the web for the easiest way to do this and have the sounds preload minimal base64 SFX

> Looping synthwave via a free API or solution you find when searching the web

> SFX triggers:

> Laser â†’ randomize pitch Â±10%

> Coin â†’ "ding"

> Explosion â†’ "boom"

> Combo â†’ rising "whoosh"

> Low life â†’ heartbeat loop when `lives === 1`

> Mute toggle on **M** key

> 7. Game Over & Retry

> **Explosion animation** centered on player, then overlay "GAME OVER"

> Typewriter reveal of final score + "SO CLOSE!" or "BITCOIN LEGEND!"

> Show "SPACE = RETRY" button; on press, reset all state with **no reload**

> 8. Persistence & Leaderboard

> Use `localStorage` for:

> `highScore`

> `lastPlayerName:` prompt at first game over

> Display high score on loading screen as "Beat the legend: X pts"

> 9. Performance & Polish

> **60 FPS** target - batch draw calls, reuse particle objects

> **All logic + render** in two loops:

> `function update(dt) { /* move, collision, spawn, score */ } function draw() { /* clear, background, entities, UI */ } requestAnimationFrame(loop);`

> Keep total lines â‰²500 if possible

> **â€” Agent, oneâ€‘shot this:**

> **Write HTML skeleton** with embedded `<style>` and `<script>`.

> **Implement loading screen** and transition.

> **Build core classes**: `Player`, `EntityManager` (spawn, update, draw).

> **Add controls, laser system, collision detection.**

> **Layer on collectibles, obstacles, combos, speed ramp.**

> **Add VFX: particles, screenâ€‘shake, UI popâ€‘ups.**

> **Integrate audio via Web Audio or free solution.**

> **Implement GameOver & retry logic.**

> **Hook up localStorage high score.**

> **Optimize for smooth 60 FPS.**

> Prioritize **instant gratification** - every input triggers satisfying visual/audio feedback. Make **Bitcoin Blaster** the ultimate "just one more game" experience.
